_header: I read in a story I can shew you anon
_description: A tale of Henry III and the Archbishop of Canterbury

OxfCCC255.First Lines:
I read in a story I can shew you anonOf a noble prince by you
                    called King Jhon…
OxfCCC255.Last Lines:
…I end besechinge god of his graceto grant hus in heaven a
                    Resting place
OxfCCC255.Note: Written by a hand of the sixteenth to seventeenth century
OxfCCC255.Attributed Title:
A tale of Henry þe 3 and þe Archbishop of Canterbury (f.
                    105)
